title: RACING EVENT detail page Â» RACING SERIES
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see the RACING SERIES to which the RACING EVENT belongs to\
So I can quickly verify that I am not accidentally looking at the wrong event
description:
* The RACING EVENT detail page is extended to contain a section for the connected RACING SERIES.
* The RACING SERIES is presented with its name and primary information.
* The RACING SERIES contains a link to its detail page.
* The RACING SERIES has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no RACING SERIES connected to the RACING EVENT then the section is not displayed at all.
